doc:
Jeremy Lloyd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeremy_Lloyd 0 John Jeremy Lloyd, OBE (22 July 1930 – 23 December 2014) was an English writer, screenwriter, author, poet and actor, best known as co-author and writer of several successful British sitcoms, including Are You Being Served? and 'Allo 'Allo!. John_Jeremy_Lloyd , OBE ( 22_July_1930 – 23_December_2014 ) was an_English_writer_,_screenwriter_,_author_,_poet_and_actor , best_known as co-author_and_writer of several_successful_British_sitcoms , including Are You Being_Served ? and ' Allo_'_Allo ! .
